 Megaton furiously stomped out of the C.R. chamber. Time for revenge, 
he thought(sorry Trunks no copyright intended).
Megaton:Computer pinpoint last known position of transformer Mustex.
 A map appeared in front of him and a flashing dot shown at Maximal 
City.
                   
           O.k. Cyberwolf, he's all yours and
           just like you left him(except for

>  Mustex gently rocked the baby(talk about out of character) and

> greater(I'm open to suggestion we can't leave it a mystery forever 
or

same
